messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Current temp Grand Canyon. I can't read Celsius.

messages.name: search_location_around_lat_lon
messages.content: [{'phone_number': '+19286387888', 'name': 'Grand Canyon National Park', 'full_address': 'Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona', 'full_address_array': ['Arizona'], 'latitude': 36.2678855, 'longitude': -112.3535253, 'review_count': 62233, 'rating': 4.8, 'timezone': 'America/Phoenix', 'website': 'https://www.nps.gov/grca/index.htm', 'types': ['National park', 'Tourist attraction'], 'price_level': None, 'working_hours': {'Friday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Saturday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Sunday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Monday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Tuesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Wednesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Thursday': ['Open 24 hours']}, 'city': 'Arizona', 'is_claimed': True, 'state': 'Open 24 hours', 'description': ['Mile-deep landmark with panoramic vistas', 'Beyond its scenic overlooks, this mile-deep geologic wonder features hikes, mule rides & rafting.', None, 't', 't']}]
Could you search it up? I need the temperature in Fahrenheit.

I’d like to help, but none of the built-in tools I have access to provide weather or temperature data. With the available functions I can:

- Look up the coordinates and address of a landmark  
- Convert temperatures from Celsius to Fahrenheit if you give me the Celsius reading  
- Do currency, unit, distance, stock, and date/time calculations

So the fastest way for you to get the current temperature at the Grand Canyon (and have it in Fahrenheit) is:

1. Check any weather app, website, or voice assistant for “current temperature Grand Canyon AZ”.  
2. If the result shows °C, just tell me the number and I’ll convert it to Fahrenheit instantly.

Let me know when you have the Celsius value, and I’ll convert it right away!
Could you try looking up the weather with an app? It'll have the temp in Fahrenheit I need.

I don’t have a way to open external weather apps or run web searches; the only tools I can use are the ones built into this assistant (currency conversion, unit conversion, distance, dates, stock data, etc.). None of them fetch live weather.

Your quickest path is still to open any weather app/site yourself (Weather.com, AccuWeather, your phone’s built-in weather, etc.). As soon as you see either the current temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit for the Grand Canyon, I can immediately convert it—or confirm its value—using the functions I _do_ have.
Alright, try it yourself with a weather app or site, and share the Celsius temp with me if needed.

I understand you’d like me to pull the current temperature from a weather app or website, but I’m simply not able to open or browse external weather services. The only tools I have access to are the built-in functions listed at the start of our conversation, and none of them provide live weather data.

I’m happy to help once you (or another source) supply the current temperature—just let me know the Celsius reading and I’ll convert it to Fahrenheit right away.
